segment.source: Drop file here, or click to select from file system
File size is , and it may take sometime to upload.
A few places out of sync:
Upload new image and insert to this poem
Transform absolute URL of local src URL to relative URL
What action to take when clicking annotation chip
Only admin can assign or unassign admin.
Please give the album a title
Forgot your password? So enter your Email address associated with your account
Please give the annotation a name
New tag is added and associated

notes.note: user need to input the same password again to confirm

segment.source: We are still working on this page. Keep an eye on our newsletters to stay up to date with the latest news and information regarding future developments.
The record is altered. Are you sure to quit without saving?
File type of selected file is unrecognized. If you upload it then it may not be displayed in the future. Do you want to upload it?
Suggest tags based on all existing tags matching phases of poems
Save All Poem Data into JSON except images
The page your are trying to visit can't be found.
No collection return probably due to invalid config.
[]: trying to create multiple instances, but this service should be a singleton.
Reordering is supported only when the number of superscripts equals to the number of numbered annotations.
Album with the same title exists.
Cannot logout befor upgrading. You may open a new browser tab or relaunch the app to upgrade.
Import Zip file with exported images
There are some registered numbered annotations not existing in poem anymore: . Do you want to remove them?
Export All Published in Traditional Chinese
Annotation with the same name exists.
Select album and then select poems to add to album
This app is designed to have both frontend and backend sitting in the same host, when locally hosted images or other binary files are used in content. But this deployment uses 2 hosts.
New version of Poetry App available to replace current / . Load the update now?
No response from backend . Connection is unavailable.
Find out if some images are not associated with any poem then reconcile
Original resolution or scale to fit width
Save Poem Data published into JSON except images
The username or password may be incorrect.
Src URL of Local to Relative
Remove numbered annotations not in superscripts.
Suggest numbered annotations based on all sups
Type new annotation or associate with existing, and click chip to edit details.
Superscript with is not matching any numbered annotations. Please Suggest Numbered Annotations and Remove Orphaned Annotations.
Not found. Things may be out of sync.
Pick Year First in Published Date
Suggest annotations based on all existing annotations matching phases of poem
Check to assign roles to current user.
Album HTML tags copied to Clipboard
The derived concrete class had not called super(DerivedClassName) properly.
No response from backend. Connection is unavailable.
For actionable items, please save current works before action
Registration successful for . And a confirmation Email will be sent to the account holder to confirm the Email address.
This will clear all contents and settings, and the app will logout after the clearing. Do you want to clear all?
Not allow to print empty document.
Valid input should be greater than or equal to 0 and less than 1440.
File size is , and it is currently too large to be uploaded.
New version of Poetry App available to replace current / . Load the update now? However, you may say NO before finishing current works and then upgrade.
Min. length: 6; digit, symbol, lowercase and uppercase
Album plain text copied to Clipboard
Are you sure to delete tag ?
Not allow to save empty document.
Done. Please logout later to reload.
You can select from only existing albums.
Select album for a collection of poems
New annotation is added and associated
Export All Published in Simplified Chinese
Email sent. Please check your email to reset your password.
Sync registered annotations with sups and reorder superscripts
